snippet.title: My Little Blacksmith Shop | Official Alpha Update 0.1.0
snippet.description:
Alpha 0.1.0 update!

My Little Blacksmith Shop is a blacksmith crafting game created with Unreal Engine 4. Forge crafting material parts together to sell them to your customers and explore a growing landscape.

---
Download game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/980940/My_Little_Blacksmith_Shop/
---

#MyLittleBlacksmithShop #BlacksmithGame #NobleGameStudio
